alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 25 at 1:03PM MST until January 27 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THURSDAY TO 8 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. Areas of blowing snow with visibility reduced to under a half mile at times. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...From 11 AM Thursday to 8 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds may be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. Areas of blowing snow creating slick roads and poor visibility.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
